page.title: 20AN 11 YEAR OLD'S LIFE
page.content:
I am an 11 year old boy and was born in West Hill Hospital in Dartford and have lived all my life in Paddock Close, South Darenth. There are 4 in our family, and my dog Taffy. Tracy, my sister is 18 years old. My Nan lives opposite in a flat; she moved there in November 1983. Dad leaves early to go to work, he is a bookseller and visits many places. Mum takes me to school, Tracy to college and then goes to work. On Saturday Tracy works in Dartford Coop, and on Sunday works at the old peoples homes in the village. I am going to Wilmington Secondary School in September.
CREDITS Entries have been made by staff, parents, pupils and friends of Horton Kirby C. of E. Primary School.
